name: ELEPHANT BUTTE IRRIGATION DISTRICT
description: Irrigation District that provides water to farmers and maintains water delivery system.
sampleDescriptions: Track implementation of Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act (WIIN Act) PL 114-322
Track and report on Clean Water Act related legislation and the EPAs NPDES general permit program and Waters of the United States rule-making status.

Provide assistance in communications on a variety of service related issues between Elephant Butte Irrigation District and the Bureau of Reclamation.
